implementation.functions: -- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- VirtualSensor -- https://github.com/toggledbits/VirtualSensor -- Patrick Rigney, patrick@toggledbits.com -- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- function startupVirtualSensor(dev) luup.log("VirtualSensor Plugin START-UP!") VirtualSensor = require("L_VirtualSensor1") virtualSensorTick = VirtualSensor.plugin_tick -- virtualSensorRequestHandler = VirtualSensor.requestHandler -- luup.register_handler("virtualSensorRequestHandler", "VirtualSensor") return VirtualSensor.plugin_init(dev) end

action.name: GetInterval
action.run: return -- what we do here doesn't matter, luup uses the relatedStateVariable directly

action.name: SetInterval
action.run: local newInterval = lul_settings.newTargetValue if newInterval ~= nil then newInterval = tonumber(newInterval, 10) end if newInterval ~= nil and newInterval > 0 then luup.variable_set("urn:toggledbits-com:serviceId:VirtualSensor1", "Interval", newInterval, lul_device) return true end return false
